Specimen Type(s): Digitized surgical pathology slides prepared from FFPE tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Paige.AI FullFocus web-based software for viewing and managing digital pathology slides scanned by Philips Ultra Fast Scanner for primary diagnosis.
Indications for Use Summary: Software-only device for viewing and management of digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides prepared from FFPE tissue as an aid to pathologists for primary diagnosis; not for use with frozen sections, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
